website_summaries.verdict: Flaxseed oil tablets made from non-GMO flaxseeds.
pros: Users report quick results for positive health changes
cons: Capsules contain gelatin, which is an animal-based product

customer_reviews.title: May work for you, me not so much ... *EDITED
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this 2 months ago for hair shedding and loss. I give it 3 stars because it may be a good product for you, but in my case the hair loss became worse. I take biotin and other supplements for the same problem but I think adding this oil didn't allow them to work. No scientific evidence just my experience. *Update: Beware of this seller. Said you'll get a second bottle free or refund if not satisfied. I've been asking for refund, for this and another product, but they have not responded. Bogus guarantee and lousy customer service
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good, works Well for Dry Eyes
customer_reviews.text: When my child became sensitive to fish oil, we switched over to this band of flaxseed oil for her omega3 essential fatty acids. Its taste is palatable enough that she simply chews it several times a day, and loves the taste. It helps prevent dry, red eyes and soothes a sore throat. It has high omega 3s but also some omega 6 and 9 essential fatty acids. We've ordered this many times and it has worked well for us.
customer_reviews.author: SefariSoosk

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered this product because I thought it was a good price to pay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I thought it was a good price to pay. I also liked the fact that it is organic. My order arrived as promised. After using it I am happy with the size of the capsules which are easy to swallow. I have not noticed any aftertaste. I was surprised to receive an email from the company with an offer of a free 2nd bottle for writing a review. I've included a photo of one of the capsules next to some stamps to give you an idea on the size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Omeara

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune disease and the doctor wanted me taking fish oil to get omega 3 benefits, however with my autoimmune issues comes food sensitivities, I tried many fish oil brands that were suppose to be “pure” and they still bothered me. I was looking online one day to see where else I can get these omega 3’s and came across this product. I have only been taking it a few weeks but so far so good!! The first thing I noticed is that my hair wasn’t as dry. I am hoping this product will help with my other issues over time and help to keep my immune system in check.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rusin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Big Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product came in a large size, as both my husband and I take it. Product seems to be really helping my husband who has neuropathy from a inguinal hernia repair, and heart issues. I have taken flaxseed oil for a couple of years now, I don't tolerate fish oil. This product seems to work really well for my husband. Naturwise always has some excellent organic products.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Menopausal Symptoms!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this supplement after reading that Flaxseed Oil can help with post menopausal symptoms, as well as provide your essential Omega's and being a vegan, I didn't want to take Fish Oil. I also have dry eyes. I have not really felt a difference with my dry eyes, but I have been able to stop taking my Estradiol in place of this and I also have not noticed any side effects, which is a plus! The pills are a little on the big side, but they slide down easily, so don't let that scare you. It's a good deal, for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Randall

customer_reviews.title: The gels are so fresh & soft... wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! First thing I noticed was how soft & fresh the gels are. & my other products are so hard? My tryglcerides went way down & HDL finally well above 100 yes!! & my BP is lower. Now this is since right before Christmas..I take 3 a day.. I will never use another brand... I was asked to submit my review for a free bottle of these!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Improvement To Dry Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems with dry eyes for years. My prescription for dry eyes were too costly. I decided to try NatureWise Organic Flaxseed Oil Max capsules. I had my eye exam last month and my doctor told me my dry eyes have improved by 70 to 75%. I don't have to use my OTC eye drops as often as I did before I started using Flaxseed Oil. I will continue to buy these supplements as long as they continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: Maedee F. Young

customer_reviews.title: Burping up fishy taste!! this bottle is bad!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these a few times and the same fishy taste that I'm burping up is really awful. After doing some research, the flaxseed oil can have a "fishy" taste when it has gone bad. I'm not understanding how this happened bc I always keep the bottle in a dark cabinet in my air conditioned home at all times as suggested. Now I'm scared to take anymore and this bottle is wasted... I feel like this was a bad bottle and should get a refund or new bottle if I return it. There are still a lot of soft gels left in this bottle & I'm be Happy to send back to seller. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great product and all-natural
customer_reviews.text: I have been re-ordering this item several times already from Amazon and taking this once daily for 2 years. Love the product, it is organic and all-natural, has great ingredients for Omega-3, this keeps my hair, nails and skin look healthy at my 60... I look and feel much younger than my age and everyone compliments how my skin looks. I have good energy, feel pretty tolerant to flu and cold and do not experience any unwanted side effects.
customer_reviews.author: One Smart Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I selected this product based on a research article that recommended it for endometriosis. While I am combining it with a handful of other supplements, I find that this is making a noticeable difference in helping balance my hormones and also helped ease hormonal acne. I have been taking it consistently for almost 4 months and I consider it an essential part of my supplement routine.
customer_reviews.author: dancngal07

customer_reviews.title: Really work!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking them 2-3x a day for a few months and notice a real difference. I’m not a believer in vitamins but my friend got me to take these. I have seen improvements in my skin, my pain levels have decreased, AND combined w turmeric and vitamin d3, I think it’s the reason I haven’t gotten sick this winter! (I have chronic bronchitis and get sick every winter!!) true believer!!!
customer_reviews.author: _laurenzohamilton_

customer_reviews.title: Great source of Omega 3
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of NatureWirse Flaxseed Oil. I started taking this as an addition to my hormone regimen which was recommened to me by my naturopath. Not only does it improve my omega 3 intake but it does make a difference in my hormone levels and gives me the good oils that my body needs during my "twilight" years LOL. Omega 3 helps women in their postmenopausal years and I feel it with my overall well being and mental peace. Great Product will continue to use this brand as long as my body needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Sll

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would help for my chronic dry eyes, but after taking it twice a day for 6 weeks I see no difference. Since I waited too long, I can't file for a refund. The capsules are pretty large, too.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander John

customer_reviews.title: Flax seed oil
customer_reviews.text: I am taking this on the advice of my opthamologist; I have ocular rosacea and my eyes are really dry. I can tell a little improvement. I've been using this product for 2 months. Capsules are large but easy to swallow. After taking, I occasionally burp some time later and i can taste the Flax seed oil (fishy tasting) although this is not suppose to be made from fish. I hope not, trying to keep to my vegetarian diet. IMHO; price is a bit high. I'll try for another two months and then reacesses.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: It's working...
customer_reviews.text: Just like to share my family experience after taking your flax seed oil which I bought from Amazon. Specially my daughter, she has clearer skin as she is facing hormones imbalance issues. Her skin is clearing up specially in the neck line area. Also my son who is in school and has ADD, since taking these caps has noticed more focus when studying. I will definitely will by again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Blue

customer_reviews.title: cleared my breakout and treating my hormone imbalance
customer_reviews.text: I was having breakout and my menstrual cycle was irregular. A friend commanded me to take Flaxseed Oil with Evening Primrose Oil every night before bed to treat my hormone imbalance . So I started taking 2 Flaxseed Oil capsules a day, one in the morning with my vitamins, one before bed like a said. My break out stopped after 2 weeks! And this month my period came on time. I am in love with the product ❤
customer_reviews.author: yao

customer_reviews.title: Did a search for VEGAN  FLAX SEED OIL. THESE CONTAIN BEEF.
customer_reviews.text: Did a search for VEGAN FLAX SEED OIL and ordered two bottles. When I got around to taking some, I checked ingredients. THEY CONTAIN BEEF. They are now in the rubbish bin Thanks loads for wasting my money. I will never purchase anything from NatureWise ever again.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD MCCLELLAND

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have started taking the NatureWise Flaxseed oil to supplement my diet with Omega 3. I just can’t do the fish oil, so this is a great alternative. The capsules are about an inch long, but easily swallowed. There is no bad taste similar to some fish oil capsules. The great thing is that you only need to take one capsule a day. I have already noticed my eyes are not as dry in the morning; quite the problem in bitterly cold Minnesota. I just feel better taking the Flaxseed capsules since so many American diets are deficient in Omega 3’s.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: i must say that I noticed a nice reduction in the appearance of cellulite in my legs
customer_reviews.text: I was told by my eye doctor to purchase this for my dry eye problem. The lids of my eyes were not producing proper lubrication. I'm not sure if my eyes have fully benefited just yet. However, i must say that I noticed a nice reduction in the appearance of cellulite in my legs. It wasn't anything drastic..but slightly noticeable within just a week! The downside is that I have auto immune issues and for some reason this product gave me the worst body ache pain I have ever felt to this point. I firmly believe that for a normal person this product would be fantastic! However, for me for some unexplained reason it just didn't work. to my dismay.
customer_reviews.author: Chip L

customer_reviews.title: If you aren't eating a Mediterranean diet everyday, you best start popping these pills
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid believer in flaxseed ever since the day Dr. Oz taught Oprah to grind it first. In addition to grinding flaxseed for additional fiber and Omega3's in meals (also try it in greek yogurt), I've decided to amp up my dosage. If you aren't eating a Mediterranean diet everyday, you best start popping these pills. They may not reverse damage from sun or smoking, but they won't hurt you. In fact, Flaxseed and Flaxseed Oil will aid in warding off heart disease. For $16.99, this brand and bottle presents a significant value and appears authentic, fresh and is well reviewed online.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: last 1/5 of bottle was full of busted capsules
customer_reviews.text: was taking this for over 2 years. never occurred to me to empty out the bottle and check if all the pills were unbusted. near the last 1/4 mark i started noticing some were very oily. then i decided to empty the bottle out and found the bottom 1/5 had many that were busted and the contents were all spilled on the inside of the bottle! I left a message with Amazon but no one followed up. FYI: i did some research and actually flaxseed needs to be digested in semi-powdered form to be effective... not as an oil, thus i found it less effective than plain ol' fish oil. and now they make fish-oil "burpless"!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Rox

customer_reviews.title: Love these! ❤
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these just a few days shy of 60 days. I'll start off by saying my entire life I suffered from dry skin especially on my face. It was a constant frustration & I bought pretty much every skincare product known to man. Since taking these my skin has never been better, I no longer suffer from tight, dry, & flaky skin. My nails have also become super strong & grow like weeds, something that didn't happen before. I highly recommend trying this product, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Dreese

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 68 year young at heart male. I was familiar with flaxseed oil and Naturewise has made be a believer. I started taking this over a month ago because of several issues, including digestive issues, high cholesterol blood tests, significant joint pain, and inflammation through out my body. This product is a blessing. You will not have a problem taking these softgels. When Naturewise says softgels, they really mean what they say. My joint pain has reduced, my digestive problems more effective at food assimilation, and my elimination is improving. I will continue to use Naturewise flaxseed oil. You never want to stop taking a supplement that help you get better. Thank you so much for an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hicks

customer_reviews.title: You Will Notice Better Hair, Skin, and Nails
customer_reviews.text: I was online searching for an Omega-3 I had heard how Krill oil is better quality. But when I found this product, I couldn't believe my eyes! This is organic, an Omega-3, and it benefits hair, skin, and nails, no more questions. You also can't beat the price, I looked up more products from the company I had to try this one and others. Amazing products, I have 6. My hair is thicker and stronger, I did notice my fingernails grow faster and they're strong and my skin is softer and more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: I always have issues taking fish oil not because the taste but other side effects such as bloating and bad digestion. I have look at other krill or others similar but nothing compare to flaxseed oil, reason I chose this product because quantity and quality I have taken other flaxseed oil. None compare to naturewise you guys are life saver this product much better than just omega, Thank you for this amazing product is a life changer.
customer_reviews.author: DT8891

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produ
customer_reviews.text: Ive been taking Naturewise Flaxseed Oil capsules for years they help with joint pain blood pressure healthy hair and nails. I will always use this great product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dozenoya65

customer_reviews.title: Part of my Daily Regimen with good results
customer_reviews.text: In the last year I have changed a great deal in my life. One major area has been to move away from prescriptions and seek to address my health issues, which are significant as a 30 year cancer survivor, using natural supplements. It's hard to know exactly which products and to what degree each of those products have contributed to the positive results I am experiencing, but this Flaxseed Oil is what I use and have been using for several months. Being more careful and deliberate about what I put in my body has made a difference. I appreciate and can recommend this product fully. 5 stars Barton Breen
customer_reviews.author: Barton Breen

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these about 2-3 weeks ago, because I had noticed cracks in my heels recently, something I had not ever dealt with before. I realized I may be lacking Omega's in my diet, since I hadn't been taking any Omega's for quite some time. The cracks have really improved, and my feet overall have gotten much softer. This tells me I'm on the right track. I believe in the quality and purity of this product. I like that these are plant based, a great alternative to the controversial fish oil option.
customer_reviews.author: Hot in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: really helped with dry eye
customer_reviews.text: I first started taking this about a year ago as its reviews indicated it would help with dry eye more than other flaxseed oil formulas. When I had a lapse of a couple months in taking it and was taking evening primrose oil, my dry eye was much, much worse. I started taking a capsule again twice a day, and it has really helped with my dry eye symptoms. I'm really glad this product is out there!
customer_reviews.author: K Witt

customer_reviews.title: Proper Omega 3, 6 and 9 balance. You found it. Vegan? Fine, great. Effective? ABSOLUTELY.
customer_reviews.text: My cholesterol numbers are phenomenal. I can't understate this enough. I'm a 30-something guy and my heart wants me to take these twice a day. I've tried other brands, but my doctor has no interest in putting me on statin drugs. I'm convinced these helped make that reality. I rotate on and off of things that get me curious. This is my constant.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cusack

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. My skin, nails, and hair have improved. Facial wrinkles are less prominent, dark circles around eyes have lightened. Husband noticed the improvement which is a bonus. Dark spots on my hands have lightened dramatically. Wish I had taken before and after photos! Nails have become stronger and finally grow! Hair has improved and no longer dry and brittle. Can't say enough and will definitely continue taking the flaxseed oil.
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with dry eye, my eye doctor recommended fish oil or flaxseed oil, which he said was better, so I checked amazon and found Nature wise, I take them three times a day and they seem to help a lot, very happy with this product!! Vision is not something to mess with so if I find a product that works, I continue to take it
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Heisner

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this capsules for about 15 days and I can already tell the difference. I'd always get dry skin behind my ears no matter how much water or lotion I applied to the area. DRY AREA NO MORE! My skin is also a lot smoother and not flaky around my t-zone, meaning it's become a lot easier to apply my CC cream <3 I have been boasting about how great this product is to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Source of Alpha-Linoleic-Acid
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good source of ALA, as part of my natural healing process, battling autoimmune disorders, especially RA. This is a quality, potent source, that has the right balance of Omega-3, 6, and 9 for my needs. It has been part of my daily routine to help strengthen my body, and really helps with my skin, nails and hair, which have been damaged by having to take methotrexate. I appreciate the way this Flaxseed Oil has been extracted and produced without any garbage added, especially keeping out the top food allergens. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lipsky

customer_reviews.title: Great source of omega 3 fatty acids!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for 4 weeks today. I have ankylosing spondylitis which is an autoimmune disease that attacks joints, eyes, skin, intestines etc. Supplements are a huge part of my treatment and a great compliment to my healthy diet. I prefer flax seed oil over fish oil for many reasons and I found this brand on Amazon. I was really excited to try it because of all the great reviews. I have to say I am so glad I did! I have so much better skin and way less joint pain taking this flax seed oil. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Gut it Right
customer_reviews.text: I gave naturewise flaxseed cold-pressed flaxseed oil four stars because I gave it time, over 2 months. and the results are remarkable! Even though, I do flaxseeds on salads and in cooking, it is not enough. I do not do farm fish or wild caught because of polluted environments, so I don't get necessary Omega 3 in my diet from those foods. I do not like the taste of fish oils nor is there source defined. I was hoping to supplement but had no idea how pleased I would be, my digestive system, gut is on track.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I usually take fish oil supplements but decided to switch over to flaxseed oil. Best decision I have ever made. The pills are easy to swallow and it does not have an aftertaste. I take these mainly for my brain health and maintaining my blood pressure. So far so good. My husband also has MS and this is a better brand for him to take to help with his brain health. We will continue to take this brand of flaxseed.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time, and I began to consume two pills a day, once in the morning and once at night. To my delight, my long-term acne problem started clearing up within a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flaxseed oil, but
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flaxseed oil, but the gelcaps are stuck together, difficult to consume them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received an offer in the box for a free bottle for writing a review. I would write one anyway. It’s important to me to use high quality, certified organic products as much as possible. I have been using as directed & am pleased with the results. I wear contacts & most days my eyes are so dry I have trouble removing the contacts. I’ve noticed in the past few days that it has not been a problem. That really surprised me. I’ve also noticed that it is helping my gut. I can only imagine that it is also helping my body in other ways.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Best supplement ever!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pills are the most amazing thing I have ever taken. I was suffering from rosacea and severe dry skin, I had tried multiple topical products and nothing worked. This was the cure all. With in a couple weeks my skin had a major turn around. It isn't flaky anymore and my sensitivity has almost diminished. I highly recomend these pills to anyone who is struggling with mild rosacea and severe dry skin, it is AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Flax Oil Works!
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor suggested I try this for my dry eyes and it has worked so well. I am very pleased. I started taking this in December; one each morning and night and my eyes are so much better. The last brand I used I was trying the maximum of 6 per day and did not get anywhere the benefits I have from this brand. Very glad I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Glassingal

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement to help with irregular ovulation
customer_reviews.text: I began taking this supplement upon recommendation in the book “Cycles, Fertility, & Nutrition” as a means of regulating my ovulation cycle. Upon taking it, I noticed ovulation regularity (having extremely irregular periods since age 13) and a consistency in my basal temperatures. There is no taste to this product and they contain the essential fatty acids I was looking to supplement. The pills are large but go down super smoothly. They do tend to stick together in the bottle but this doesn’t alter the pill itself, the bottle just requires shaking to get them to come apart. I reccommend this product to those supplementing to regulate their cycles!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with dry eye and I was told that Omega 3s were a great addition to my diet to help. I decided to try this brand of oil because of the high-quality organic ingredients and reading the great reviews. I feel that this product has been helping my eyes since taking it and a great benefit is that my hair and nails have been growing more too!
customer_reviews.author: Zerlina

customer_reviews.title: Good Source of Omega 3's
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quality source of Omega 3 without having to use fish oil supplements. I have trouble digesting them. These are easy to swallow, and if I take them with a meal or at bedtime, I have no issues with them reminding me I swallowed one. I have been using this product for about a year and have had no issues with quality, packaging, or ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: feeling great.
customer_reviews.text: I am 65 years old and have been told I need to take Flaxseed oil. I found this brand as the reviews were fantastic. I have been taking them for several weeks now and I have noticed I have more energy. That is wonderful. I will keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Schindler

customer_reviews.title: ok for pans only.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to season pans only. I wouldnt take this junk it smells like bad fish. Use Ultimate Omega fron Nordic Naturals with a lemony taste and much better for you. I use it for week and made me break out, doctor suggested omega3 not flaxseed!
customer_reviews.author: F. R.

customer_reviews.title: I won’t be without it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this product for a year now. I switched to flaxseed from fish oil because of mercury concerns. It has helped with mood and body aches. I really notice a difference if I don’t take it. And an added bonus is no fish smell/taste. Great customer service too. The last order was one big lump of capsules, most likely due to heat. I was sent a new bottle the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn K

customer_reviews.title: Supplement had bad odor!  Would not order again
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stinks! Maybe went bad or something... too much hassle to return so I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hornet314

customer_reviews.title: I read that flaxseed is the best vegetable source of omega-3's
customer_reviews.text: I have cholesterol problems as well as kidney disease. I thoroughly research any supplements that I take. Both my GP and nephrologist said to add omega-3's to my diet. I started taking fish oils but then I read that one has to eat fish in order to get the omega fatty acids. Fish oil supplements just do not provide the same nutritional value. Furthermore, I read that flaxseed is the best vegetable source of omega-3's. I strive to eat organic foods, so the Naturewise Organic Flaxseed Oil was a great choice for me. Thank you for the quality and value of your product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Price

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Flaxseed oil capsules for years for elevated cholesterol and have used many brands. These are easy to swallow - not as big as some others. Quality seems good - haven't noticed any unpleasant taste or broken capsules.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mom based on her doctor recommendation, she’s been complaining about discomfort around her armpit near the breast area, we went to get mammogram and ultrasound, but the doctor didn’t find anything, and then she recommended my mom to take flaxseed oil, after few weeks taking it, she said she feel a little better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Melti You

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Nature wise flaxseed oil is really great product, this is my second bottle, it healps to improve skin, my feet used to be so dry all the times used lotion every day but didn’t help, but since I been taking nature wise flaxseed oil one capsule twice daily, I don’t use any lotions for my feet and hands , it’s really amazing product, it contains omega 3 that is much better for healthy heart, much better than fish oil , I can’t stand with fish oil gives me constipation, but with nature wise flaxseed oil capsules no problem at all , is real organic non GMO halal gelatin, I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Manzoor Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good quality flax oil
customer_reviews.text: This flax oil supplement helps with increasing energy, balancing mind to be more positive, clearing up dry skin and dandruff, and with improving immune system and health. This replaced my prior fish oil supplement that was not helping as much as needed in these areas. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: G & E

customer_reviews.title: Stomach upsets
customer_reviews.text: I am upset that I bought the larger bottle. I cannot take it. TMI: Noticed I was having very bad diarrhea and this was the only thing that I had recently changed. I stopped taking it and went right back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had some gut microbiome testing done and it identified flaxseed oil as a 'superfood' for my biome. So, I wanted to get a quality product to take daily to ensure I was getting a fair amount daily. This cold pressed organic flaxseed oil, in capsule form, fit the bill! I love that the product is free of so many allergens and with no dangerous or questionable additives! Also taking the Vitamin D from this brand and loving that!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy to have found a product that gives me the benefits of fish oil without all the issues that come with it. The packaging, price, and customer service with their company are all superb. I look forward to the benefits it’ll provide me. I’ve been taking it for over a month and have had no adverse effects. I may even be seeing a bit of growth in my thin eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: product ok, bottle no good
customer_reviews.text: the product itself is ok, the reason why i give three stars because the bottle. the bottle is made soft plastic, and the cover made of metal. every time i tried to close the cover tight, the cover pop up and loose again, that cause the soft capsules stick togather.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product faithfully for over two weeks, and am very pleased. I am super sensitive and often experience side effects with supplements. I chose this brand because of its purity, and am happy to report, no adverse reactions. It seems to be helping with digestive support, and I’m sure that over time the results will be even better.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t agree with me
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could take it! The acid in this and fish oil don’t agree with my stomach and cause enzymes that make me cough and create thick mucus. Sorry, only sharing if anyone else has this problem! It took me a long process to figure this out. I hope it helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great flax seed oil supplement
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help control my cholesterol and triglycerides in my blood test. I like this project because it does not have the after test of fish oil. It's easy to swallow and and has no bad taste. I've been using flax seed oil and naturewise is of great quality and value. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Trombley

customer_reviews.title: I love Naturewise products so I tried their organic flaxseed oil
customer_reviews.text: I was having a problem with my hair and nails. I was told to add omega 3 to my regimen. I love Naturewise products so I tried their organic flaxseed oil. Flaxseed is very healthy for you. I really like that their products do not contain soy and is non-GMO. This is very important to me. Great products. I will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I read up on the company and felt like it was a company I was willing to support ...
customer_reviews.text: I was taking fish oil for cholesterol and found the aftertaste to be very unpleasant unless I was willing to spend considerable money to buy the 'high grade' stuff. While searching for alternatives, I found this. I read up on the company and felt like it was a company I was willing to support so I tried this product. I'm very pleased with this product! My cholesterol levels are noticeably lower and my hair/skin is healthier. I've been so impressed with this product that I've ordered the 10 Day Cleanse and the Garcinia Cambogia as well. Will continue to order this product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cathell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly. The box and seal on the bottle were intact and in good condition, and the softgels seem fresh. The expiration date was also more than a year in the future, so that's good. I like that they're organic. The pills are large, but surprisingly easy to swallow because they're soft and smooth. There's no aftertaste or stomach upset. I recently started taking two of these per day (morning and night) with the hope that they will help my skin clear up. It will probably take at least a month to show any results, but so far there are no negative side effects.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: High quality product, Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great so far. The pills are very large but surprisingly easy to swallow. I normally have a hard time swallowing pills, but these are easy. I've felt great since starting these pills. My skin and eyes has been less dry, and I feel more awake and alert throughout the day, especially in the mornings. I purchased these pills with the hope of lowering my bad cholesterol. It is yet to be seen if that will happen, but I have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: AB in MD

customer_reviews.title: No side effects for us, seem beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and myself have been taking this for several months now. We started out with one and worked up to three times a day. We had no side effects on our stomach. They seem to be helpful , we will continue to take them. They are large pills but they’re not hard to swallow. They are very smooth and I don’t taste anything.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't repeat!
customer_reviews.text: I've long known I should be taking a supplement to give my body those essential Omega 3's. Especially since I don't like fish! But every fishoil supplement I ever tried repeated on me so badly I couldn't tolerate it. Only recently did I learn that flaxseed oil could be an alternate source of Omega 3's. And I am so delighted with this product! No repeating. No bad aftertaste. And finally I can answer "Yes, I AM getting my essential fatty acids!"
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Caple

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flaxseed oil because pricing was good being organic. After using it I am happy with the size of the capsules which are easy to swallow. I have not noticed any aftertaste. I feel like it helps keep my cholesterol under control, I will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organic source of important nutrients
customer_reviews.text: I replaced fish oil with these and I'm perfectly happy. They're easy to swallow and have no discernible flavor. Recent evidence may point to linoleic acid fighting the Covid 19 virus, and these have lots of it. And they're an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Kargold

customer_reviews.title: Take daily for years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this online due to the starting of the pandemic and not being able to get out much, it was a new brand I have not used before but now I'm never looking back! These are amazing, no bitter taste and easy to swallow. I think everyone should be taking this supplement.!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Artz

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING RESULTS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this product because I was trying to lower My cholesterol along with a healthy diet. To my surprise, I noticed my skin looked refreshed and my hair was shiny again, as well as my nails growing . Love that it’s organic and NO Fishy after taste.. It’s a Winner!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could try this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived and the pills are completely stuck together. I tried gently shaking them. I tried putting the bottle in the freezer and then trying to separate them. No luck. We cut the bottle open to see if I could gently pry them apart and still only got about 5 unstuck. I have a giant mess. There is oil everywhere! I have googled solutions to no avail. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this brand of flaxseed oil religiously since having some digestive and skin issues. This may not be a cure all for some but it's helped me tremendously with both added fiber and my skin issues have cleared up. I know it's from the flaxseed oil as I stopped taking it for about a month and all my symptoms returned.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kimhan

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product with great benefits
customer_reviews.text: I took this due to reading rave reviews. I have had issues with joint and ligament problems due to years of CrossFit. Recently, I have had issue with scapula muscle issue and some more soft tissue injury targeting around the shoulders due to excessive overhead exercises. After taking for a week, I have already felt pain in my shoulders subside. Omega 3s are extremely important for health, however, getting the correct ratio to Omega 6 and Omega 9 for proper absorption of the Omega 3 is hard. Due to the Fukushima radiation issue, I have also steered away taking wild caught salmon. This is an excellent product with great benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: I see a difference with my skin. Soft and even toned. My hair is healthier.
customer_reviews.author: El Fin

customer_reviews.title: NatureWise Organic Non-GMO Flaxseed Oil.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended switching from a fish oil supplement to a Flaxseed Oil supplement. I picked NatureWise because it was Organic and Non-GMO. After using for several months. I have not seen a negative effect in my blood work numbers numbers when comparing the Flaxseed oil over the fish oil. There is also the added bonus of not experiencing any after taste as I would sometimes get with the fish oil. . Customer service from NatureWise on follow up experience and results has been excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Trobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: Luv this product. It doesn't have a bad taste, very easy to swallow. Definitely makes a huge difference in keeping you regular without cramping. Also noticable improvement in hair, skin and nails. Customer service is excellent. Highly recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed oil is said to be very beneficial to people with Blood Type O
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Naturewise organic flaxseed oil soft gels (240 count). I started taking 2/day about 3 months ago after I started following the blood type diet by Dr. Dadamo. Flaxseed oil is said to be very beneficial to blood type O. I also added several other vitamin/mineral supplements to my daily routine around the same time period. Within 6 weeks, I noticed a huge improvement to my skin. I'm sure the flaxseed oil had a part in it, so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully; a healthy addition to a huge pile of 'vitamins' I'm taking daily!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit larger but I've seen bigger pills.....so they're palatable. I'm taking them for immune-system support because I have what might be considered a compromised immune-system. Hopefully; taking these will make me stronger so I can fight off what might be my next auto-immune disorder. No aftertaste but I do take them with food. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When I buy any brand of flaxseed oil, I first chew one softgel to taste the oil. NatureWise flaxseed oil has a nice fresh taste. (one major brand always has a fishy aftertaste which I never understood.) Plus, the size of the softgel is easy to swallow. I love that the product is organic and cold pressed. I have been taking 2 per day for almost 2 months and my extremely dry skin already feels smoother. I also take for the other benefits such as heart health and reduced inflammation. Overall, seems to be an excellent product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: grahams4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Flax Seed supplements!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality Flax Seed supplements! I've been taking them to boost my "good" cholesterol, since I'm vegan. I searched many different brands before I chose Nature Wise , and am happy with this choice. And I like that they are organic.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Good for you
customer_reviews.text: I do not feel a difference I don't know what I'm supposed to feel but I know that I am perimenopausal and this is a supplement that I'm supposed to I don't know what I'm supposed to feel but I know that I am perimenopausal and this is a supplement that I'm supposed to take every day so I take it it's easy to swallow it's non-GMO organic or whatever it's good stuff and I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: VENOMnVIPER

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, and no issues with any side effects. I am transitioning from fish to flax oil, so need to wait a few more weeks to see if I notice any difference. My only complaint is that I wish the bottle was glass.

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months, cholesterol is much lower!
customer_reviews.text: I have heard that Flaxseed is good for lowering cholesterol. I just had my cholesterol checked and it is done by 80-100 points from six months ago. The only major change is the addition of Flaxseed Oil to my morning regiment.
customer_reviews.author: David Landfried

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My skin and nails feel better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My skin and nails feel better than before I began taking this. My blood pressure has gone down also.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Hair, nails and energy
customer_reviews.text: I love this supplements. Just because of them I feel much more energized and less stressful. I don't need even a coffee in the morning, cause it elevates my mood enough to function through out the day. Ii have also noticed that my face skin looks better and nails became stronger. Cannot say anything about my hair, cause I also use some nice shampoo too. May be due to both of them by hair look perfect these days. Will buy it again and again. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Anar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from dry eyes, mouth and skin for a few months due to side effects of medications. I have finished one bottle of 120 capsules and started on a new one. I have clearly noted that my mouth isn't nearly as dry and my eyes aren't as dry as they have been prior to taking this product. Thank you for making a quality product that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Lehova

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is a all natural product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the Flaxseed oil is all natural ingredients verses fish oil & it helps with high cholesterol which I have & also it helps in more areas of your health, it is easy to swallow, no after taste & my daughter can swallow it very easily as well as that was a concern for me, I am extremity pleased with my purchase & will be purchasing flaxseed oil for now on! Thank you for making such an amazing all natural love product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for balancing hormones + hair & skin health!
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking this supplement as a part of the Seed Cycling regimen for balancing and regulating the menstrual cycle. This supplement is helping strengthen my follicular phase and regulating my cycles as I hoped. It's also helping keep my face hydrated and my hair silky. It's a quality flaxseed oil, no weird taste, and a great price for the quality. I'll definitely keep buying from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I switched to your flaxseed oil last month as it is organic and I wanted to enhance my immune system during this COVID19. My nails are already looking healthy and strong, actually my split nails are gone! I love that they are also non GMO, there is no aftertaste and easy to swallow, the price is great too:)

customer_reviews.title: Causes rancid burps!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rancid taste! Not made in USA, only BOTTLED here! I have been burping horrible oil taste!
customer_reviews.author: Grannylu

customer_reviews.title: strengthening my nails and helping my lifeless hair
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try this to add to my vitamins for heart health, and it is helping my fingernails and hair as well. I have my hands in water a lot as I am a cook and don't have a helper to do the dishes! My nails were splitting so badly, I couldn't cut them any shorter. They are getting stronger now and I've noticed more body coming back to my hair, it's shinier and looks healthier also. And an added bonus is I received a free bottle just by contacting the company!! Win, win!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not usable. One solid mass.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this supplement from this same company for years and have never had a problem. I should have realized something was off when it did not come in the manufacturer’s box like it usually did. It is just a mass of solid capsules. Usually just shaking the bottle will unstick them but this is a solid mass in the jar. I am not sure if they will let me return. I have placed it in the freezer hoping that might let me shake them apart. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cygan

customer_reviews.title: Ward off dry eye post-surgery
customer_reviews.text: Started taking this after my eye surgery, and I haven’t had dry eye at all. I’m also using my drops consistently as prescribed, but this definitely couldn’t be hurting. I take fish oil too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good but really large
customer_reviews.text: I really like these a lot but was worried because they’re so large! Actually they are easy to swallow. They’re soft and go down much easier than I thought. But I wish they were smaller anyway.
customer_reviews.author: PegCot

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make my stomach hurt!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, and doesn't make me sick at all! This is the ONLY Flaxseed Oil I've been able to take as others made my stomach/gut hurt horribly! I've only been taking 1 pill in the morning but do plan to up it to twice a day. Also, this is an amazing price for all the pills you get! Thank you NatureWise for making a Flaxseed Oil I can tolerate!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Improvement in just a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product is working very well for me! I started this supplement for my eye health, as recommended by my doctor. Previously, I had irritated and dry eyes that caused blurriness and fatigue, to the point of needing glasses - even with taking other omega-3 supplements! Since starting this supplement about 1 month ago, my eyes have not bugged me once! Minus 1 star for the size - would love something smaller but just as potent!
customer_reviews.author: wondergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this Flaxseed oil for a couple of months now. It has been great for the inflammation and joint pain that used to be a very big part of my daily life. Wouldn't go a day without having it. Great company to do business with and I will be buying it again Brian g
customer_reviews.author: Brian g

customer_reviews.title: great product with healthy benefits
customer_reviews.text: As I began taking naturewise Omegawise flaxseed oil......I started relaizing my hairstarted growong a bit more than usual......beforre I would see the bald of my hair but not anymore........I also realize that it gives me a balance of my moods which was making me grumpy due to lack of sleep but now u feel like I am normal...thanks to flaxseed oil.....my joints use to hurt but i ran down the staircase like i was in my early 2O's am still shock about this. I am going to recommend this to anyone who need that extra vitamins they are lacking.....its definitely benefit to my health.
customer_reviews.author: D.Williams

product_meta.title: NatureWise Organic Flaxseed Oil Max 720mg ALA | Highest Potency Flax Oil Omega 3 for Cardiovascular, Brain, Immune Support & Healthy Hair, Skin, & Nails | Gluten Free Non-GMO [2 Month - 120 Softgels]
product_meta.description:
Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)A Greener Source of Omega-3s

Omega-3 essential fatty acids are an important part of any healthy diet. They help keep your brain and heart healthy and support a healthy inflammatory and immune response. They also have natural beauty benefits, helping to nourish your hair, skin and nails. 

Most omega-3 supplements are fish oil supplements. But many people have concerns about the environmental toxins and mercury content often found in fish, as well as the sustainability and ethics of fishing. 

NatureWise Organic Flaxseed Oil is a rich, plant-based source of essential omega-3 fatty acids. Each serving is standardized to provide 720 mg of ALA, an omega-3 fatty acid that the body can convert into EPA and DHA — the same omega-3s commonly found in fish oils. Certified organic and non-GMO, it’s a clean, green alternative to fish oil supplements.*

Live Healthy, Live Happy

At NatureWise, we believe that being healthy and happy is about caring for your whole self. It’s about making wise choices that support you in feeling your best and living your fullest life. Our supplements are designed to support your body’s natural wisdom and your own healthy choices to promote authentic well-being from the inside out.
feature_bullets: HIGHEST POTENCY ALA: NatureWise Organic Flaxseed Oil delivers 720 mg ALA Omega-3 essential fatty acids per softgel, the highest concentration of ALA in any flaxseed oil supplements.
PLANT-BASED ALTERNATIVE TO FISH OILS: Flaxseed oil offers a cleaner, more sustainable, plant-based source of omega-3 essential fatty acids compared to fish oil supplements.

PURE, ORGANIC, & COLD-PRESSED: Our pure flaxseed oil is carefully extracted from organic, non-GMO flax seeds without the use of hexane or added heat, helping to preserve the delicate structure of the omega-3s.
ESSENTIAL HEALTH BENEFITS: Science confirms the importance of omega-3s in a healthy diet, with essential benefits for brain health, heart health, immune support, and healthy hair, skin and nails.*

ONLY THE BEST INGREDIENTS: Our flaxseed oil supplements are made from 100% natural, organic, non-GMO ingredients with no artificial additives, fillers or binders and are third party tested for purity and quality.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
